item.title: Doing CTF without paying VPS
item.description:
The goal I think many of us do CTFs, but also many of us don’t have any money, because we’re student or addict to drugs. So when you don’t have any money, you get creative.
For webguys who are looking for a reverse shell or who want admin cookies on a remote host (hello root-me), but don’t want to pay for a VPS, there is a free solution.
